backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing complaint submission, storage, access control, statuses, feedback, and priority scoring with role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking footer removal requirement to affected frontend layout file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining custom civic color system and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/README.md: Setup guide explaining prerequisites and steps to configure and run the Civic Lens frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration and app wrapper handling authentication, password gating, and route structure.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth and clearing password verification and query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal handling password registration and verification with validation, UI states, and backend mutations.
Type definitions for password setup modal including mode, props, and minimum password length.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInOptio: Authentication UI offering Google/Apple sign‑in options via Internet Identity login flow.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Befor: Displays before and after photos with status-based badges and a fallback when the after photo is missing.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Compl: Shows complaint metadata including priority, SLA, timestamps, location, and reporter details.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Escal: Renders a destructive badge indicating when a complaint was escalated, showing relative time.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Photo: Handles image uploads with preview, validation, and removal, calling a callback with the selected file.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Prior: Displays a priority badge with icon and label based on urgency level.
frontend/src/components/complaints/SlaBa: Shows SLA status as overdue or remaining time based on due date and complaint status.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Resolut: Form for submitting resolution feedback including confirmation, star rating, comments, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation links based on auth/admin state, and responsive sidebar menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login handling, maintaining identity state across sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordVerificati: React hook storing a password verification flag in sessionStorage and syncing it across tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating complaint and user role data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, color variables, and dark mode theme for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/MyReportsPage: Citizen dashboard showing the user’s submitted complaints with status, priority, and quick navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/SubmitComplai: Form page allowing authenticated citizens to submit a complaint with category, description, location, and photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/complaints/ComplaintD: Displays full complaint details and lets admins update status, including uploading an after‑resolution photo.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Documentation page outlining prerequisites and setup steps for running Civic Lens locally.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page presenting the app’s purpose, sign‑in options, and an overview of how the system works.
frontend/src/pages/official/HigherOffici: Shows escalated complaints to higher officials with priority and escalation info and links to detailed review.
frontend/src/pages/official/OfficialDash: Admin dashboard listing open and in‑progress complaints with priority and SLA info and links for management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON describing Civic Lens project state, including goals, architectural notes, feature list, and known issues for a civic-issue reporting system. Outlines workflows like complaint submission, deadlines, escalation, deduplication, authentication constraints, and UI requirements.
